title: Samsung Elec expects uncertainty from protectionism in 2018: chairman
text: March 23, 2018 / 12:18 AM / Updated 38 minutes ago Samsung Elec expects uncertainty from protectionism in 2018: chairman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read SEOUL (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics Co Ltd expects uncertainty from trade protectionism and geopolitical risk to persist throughout the year, its chairman of the board said on Friday. Kwon Oh-Hyun, chief executive officer of Samsung Electronics Co., speaks during the company's extraordinary general meeting of shareholders at the Seocho office building in Seoul, South Korea, on Thursday, Oct. 27, 2016. REUTERS/SeongJoon Cho/Pool The company will also “continue to enhance corporate guidance,” Kwon Oh-hyun said. Samsung held its annual shareholders meeting on Friday, with shareholders to vote on a 50:1 stock split and appointments of new board directors. Reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Stephen Coates
